Trump allies said for years that talk of a third term was a joke. Now it isn’t.
item.description: Trump allies often wrongly downplay his intentions. Here’s what many of them have said about his frequent musings on serving a third term.

item.title: Analysis: Trump allies said for years talk of a third term was a joke. Now it isn’t.
